metadata.title: CVE-2020-19861 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
When a zone file in ldns 1.7.1 is parsed, the function ldns_nsec3_salt_datais too trusted for the length value obtained from the zone file. When thememcpy is copied, the 0xfe - ldns_rdf_size(salt_rdf) byte data can becopied, causing heap overflow information leakage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-19861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ldnsutils - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1
libldns2 - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1
python-ldns - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1
python3-ldns - 1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ldns package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.0-3ubuntu4.1').
